title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 17 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: a man has been found guilty of the murder of darren kelly , who was kicked punched and stabbed to death near his home .
former towie star amy childs looks to bring home the bacon for essex in celebrity masterchef .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from us at essex live today .
but before we go , here 's a close-up of the medals won by southend veteran andy bracey at the invictus games that we mentioned earlier .
we 'll be back tomorrow morning from 08:00 with more of the county 's news , sport , weather and travel .
in the meantime , take a scroll back down the page to catch-up with today 's stories .
have a good evening .

documents.title: weather : turning unsettled overnight
text: it will stay fine and mainly dry this evening , but cloud amounts will gradually increase from the west .
a rather cloudy and milder night than of late will then follow , with some patchy rain or drizzle possible .
lows of 11c ( 52f ) .
rather cloudy tomorrow with outbreaks of showery rain spreading in from the west .
highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the forecast via bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: in the news : chris carroll guilty of darren kelly 's murder colchester hospital has new bosses
text: if you 're just joining us , here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: 'hello is it grass you 're looking for ? '
text: do n't panic , this is not the sign of relegation cutbacks at colchester united
the u 's are currently laying a new surface to make sure as much work is done before music legend lionel richie performs at the weston homes community stadium next month .
phew .

documents.title: chris carroll to be sentenced at 10:00 tomorrow
text: we shall continue following this case tomorrow as we bring you live coverage of chris carroll 's sentencing here on our essex live page .
to recap , the 20-year-old has been found guilty of murdering darren kelly in pitsea last october .
in the meantime , we 'll now take a final look at the rest of the news happening around the county .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: darren kelly was a 'kind and hard-working ' father
text: after the guilty verdict , darren kelly 's family said in a statement the 42-year-old father was `` a kind , hard-working , caring , fun-loving , all-round good guy '' .
`` he was not only a wonderful son , but a brother , a friend and especially the best father a girl could ever have .
his daughter did n't just lose a father , she also lost a friend , '' it continued .
`` r.i.p darren .
we will love , miss and remember you forever xxx . ''

documents.title: picture of convicted murderer chris carroll released
text: essex police has just released a of chris carroll , who was found guilty of murdering darren kelly earlier this afternoon .

documents.title: police 'strongly deter anyone from vigilante behaviour '
text: det ch insp stephen jennings , of the kent and essex serious crime directorate , said darren kelly `` lost his life due to the completely unfounded belief that he intended to meet an underage girl '' .
it 's after chelmsford crown court heard during the six-week trial that the lorry driver was lured to his death after claims he was a paedophile .
`` essex police strongly deter anyone from vigilante behaviour at any level .
they could be acting upon inaccurate information and putting innocent people at serious risk , '' he said .

documents.title: darren kelly murder : a timeline of events
text: here 's the timeline of events in the darren kelly murder case :

documents.title: carroll to be sentenced tomorrow
text: carroll will be sentenced at chelmsford crown court tomorrow following a unanimous guilty verdict this afternoon .
the 20-year-old was wearing a white t-shirt and muttered under his breath as the verdict was read out .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: darren kelly murder : chris carroll found guilty
text: chris carroll , 20 , of pevensey close , in pitsea , has been convicted of killing darren kelly after a trial at chelmsford crown court .
three teenagers also accused of murder were found not guilty .
mr kelly ( 42 , was kicked , punched , and stabbed to death near his home last october .

documents.title: breakingman found guilty of murdering darren kelly in pitsea last year
text: news just in from chelmsford crown court , where a 20-year-old man has been found guilty of murdering darren kelly in pitsea last year .
more details to follow .

documents.title: four medals for southend invictus games veteran
text: two silvers and two bronze medals .
andy bracey from southend-on-sea has come back from competing in the invictus games in florida with a plethora of bling .
the 41-year-old competed in a number of wheelchair racing events last week .
he served in northern ireland and iraq , but became a wheelchair user when he was involved in a hit-and-run incident while off duty .
`` to just be there was absolutely amazing , '' he said .
you can hear the full interview on the dave monk show from 16:00 this evening .

documents.title: headlines : chairman and chief executive of colchester hospital stand down jury continue deliberations in case of darren kelly killing
text: here are the stories we 're currently keeping an eye on in essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : dry afternoon feeling warm
text: it will be quite a dry afternoon with sunny spells and scattered clouds .
feeling warm , with highs of 19c ( 66f ) .
if you 're heading out you 'll find the latest forecast for your area from bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : one lane closed in both directions on the a120
text: one lane remains closed on the a120 in both directions between the a133 and the a12 colchester by-pass .
the lorry is said to have damaged about 200m ( 656ft ) of the central reservation .
regular updates here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: mercury theatre secures £ 1m funding
text: the mercury theatre will be celebrating today as it has just secured £ 1m of funding from essex county council .
the money will go towards the colchester-based theatre 's expansion and improvement plan that launched last year .
similar pledges of support for its £ 8.8m plan have already been received from colchester borough council and arts council england , subject to certain conditions .

documents.title: colchester hospital : what we know so far
text: if you 're just joining us , in the past hour we 've had some breaking news from colchester hospital :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lorry strikes bridge , closing a120
text: we have more details on the road closure of the a120 , between the a133 and the ardleigh interchange .
essex fire and rescue says a seven-and-a-half tonne lorry has struck a bridge on the carriageway .
crew members are currently trying to release a trapped male .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a120 closed in both directions between the a12 and a133
text: regular travel updates here .
# a120 closed both ways btwn # a12 and # a133 due to a serious incident .
more details and diversion found here

documents.title: colchester hospital not 'clinically and financially sustainable in its current form '
text: the outgoing chief executive of colchester hospital , frank sims , who started the role in october , says he is `` confident '' patients in colchester and suffolk will benefit from a partnership .

we believe that colchester is not clinically and financially sustainable in its current form and have been working with senior leaders at ipswich to see if there is an opportunity for both organisations to work more closely in clinical collaboration . ''

documents.title: ipswich duo to take over colchester hospital roles
text: frank sims and alan rose will be replaced with immediate effect by david white ( left ) and nick hulme ( right ) , who are the chairman and chief executive respectively of ipswich hospital .
they will also continue in those roles .

documents.title: colchester hospital : alan rose and frank sims stand down to 'help accelerate ' partnership with ipswich hospital
text: chairman alan rose and chief executive frank sims said they were standing down to help accelerate a long-term partnership between colchester hospital university nhs foundation trust and the ipswich hospital nhs trust .

documents.title: breakingthe chairman and the chief executive of colchester hospital leave their roles
text: both the chairman and the chief executive of colchester hospital university nhs foundation trust have both left their positions .
more details to follow .

documents.title: essex v derbyshire : play continues
text: play is under way in chelmsford , where essex are taking on derbyshire in day three of the county championship match .
a short while ago derbyshire were 158-4 in their first innings , after essex declared on 538-7 .
you can follow live updates here .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: what are the local news sites reporting today ?
text: i 've just been browsing our local news sites - here 's some of the top stories i found :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chelmsford city welcomes rod twitter reacts # welcomerod
text: twitter has been providing mixed reviews to rod stringer 's appointment as manager at chelmsford city fc .
get involved in the conversation with your views using the # welcomerod .
new manager : the # clarets are delighted to announce rod stringer as the new manager of chelmsford city # welcomerod
welcome to the clarets rod great appointment ! !
many thanks to kevin this season # welcomerod
hi - we 're looking for reaction to new manager on our bbc webpage .
are we ok to use your tweet ?
of course your more than welcome

documents.title: a word from the clarets chairman # welcomerod
text: after weeks of speculation and interviews , the cat 's out of the bag and chelmsford city 's chairman trevor smith has named the club 's new manager .
i have admired [ rod stringer ] as a manager for many years .
he ticked all the boxes as far as i was concerned , and in appointing rod i feel we have a winner who will do his utmost to help the club achieve its ambitions . ''

documents.title: a look at rod stringer 's cv # welcomerod
text: so rod stringer is the new manager of chelmsford city - but what does his cv look like ?

documents.title: breakingrod stringer named chelmsford city manager
text: meet the man who has just been announced as the new boss of the clarets - rod stringer .

documents.title: chelmsford manager announcement expected at 10:00
text: and if maldon & tiptree fc 's announcement was n't enough
we 'll keep you posted on any news we hear .
new manager : @ twitterid will announce new manager at 10am

documents.title: kevin horlock is maldon & tiptree fc 's new manager
text: maldon & tiptree fc has unveiled former manchester city and northern ireland midfielder kevin horlock as their new manager .
the 43-year-old made more than 200 appearances and scored 39 goals during his spell at city between 1997 and 2004 .
mark levey has been given the assistant manager role .

documents.title: essex almost had success in celebrity masterchef 2015
text: celebrity masterchef 2015 was ours for the taking after we had two contestants from the county taking part .
tv presenter rylan clark ( left ) and paralympian danny crates ( right ) both represented the county on the bbc one show .
sadly , danny missed out on a place in the semi-finals , and rylan was pipped to the post by former pussycat dolls dancer kimberly wyatt in the finals .
this year , hopefully towie 's amy childs can bring home the bacon .

documents.title: cctv released after building waste fly-tipped at barleylands farm
text: recognise this man ?
police want to trace him after building waste was dumped at barleylands farm in billericay on 26 april .
it caused damage to crops and cost hundreds of pounds to remove .

documents.title: amy childs to fly flag for essex in celebrity masterchef 2016
text: the cooking reputation of our county will be in the hands of former the only way is essex star amy childs , after she was announced as one of the contestants in this year 's celebrity masterchef .
the 25-year-old is one of 20 famous faces signed up for upcoming series 11 .

documents.title: darren kelly murder case : jury to continue deliberations
text: darren kelly ( 42 , was kicked , punched and stabbed to death near his basildon home last october .
chris carroll , 20 , of pevensey close , pitsea , along with two 17-year-old boys and a girl , 15 , all deny murder .
the chelmsford crown court jury retired yesterday to consider its verdict in the case , and deliberations will continue this morning .

documents.title: tuesday 's forecast : dry and bright today
text: it 's looking like a dry day with plenty of sunshine , especially during the morning .
highs of 19c ( 66f ) .
get more details for where you live at bbc weather .
author: Aisling Creevey
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: good morning from essex live
text: hello and welcome to another day of live news , sport , weather and travel updates for essex .
today we 'll keep you up-to-date with any developments in the darren kelly murder case , with the jury having retired yesterday to consider its verdict at chelmsford crown court .
we 've also got this morning 's weather coming up shortly , and the day 's other news .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
